name: burger
description: 1) Burger Madness is a restaurant app using utilizing MVC to show how relational databases can work. The skills used in this app are: 	* Node.js 	* Express 	* ORM 	* Handlebars 	* MySQL 	* Javascript 	* CSS 	This is a full-stack app that uses MySQL database, Node and Express to query and route the data in the back-end, and Handlebars and Javascript to handle UX and generate HTML.
